typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PROVIDER_ID as string,
		CMS_Provider_ID as string,
		UPIN as string,
		NPI as string,
		TIN as string,
		TIMELY_FILING_LIMIT as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		PROVIDER_NAME_PREFIX as string,
		PROVIDER_NAME_SUFIX as string,
		PROVIDER_TITLE as string,
		PHYSICAL_ADDRESS1 as string,
		PHYSICAL_ADDRESS2 as string,
		PHYSICAL_CITY as string,
		PHYSICAL_STATE as string,
		PHYSICAL_ZIP as string,
		PHONE as string,
		FAX as string,
		EXCLUDEFROMMRCHASE as string,
		EXCLUDEFROMPRRELATIONSHIP as string,
		DEA_NUMBER as string,
		LANGUAGE as string,
		Client_Provider_ID as string,
		Company_Name as string,
		Email_Address as string,
		Email_Usage_Type_Code as string,
		County as string,
		Phone_Number_2 as string,
		Phone_Number_3 as string,
		Fax_Number_2 as string,
		Fax_Number_3 as string,
		Client_Location_ID as string,
		Location_Name as string,
		Location_Usage_Type_Code as string,
		Location_Contact_Full_Name as string,
		Location_Contact_First_Name as string,
		Location_Contact_Last_Name as string,
		SSN as string,
		Network_Ind as string,
		Facility_Code as string,
		Management_Group_Code as string,
		Location_Key as string,
		Source_System_Of_Record as string,
		Medicare_Facility_Number as string,
		Provider_Location_Effective_Date as string,
		Provider_Location_Termination_Date as string,
		Usage_Preference_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Ref_Data_ID as integer,
		Ref_Table as string,
		Ref_Field as string,
		Reference_Code as string,
		Reference_Code_Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1 derive(FULL_NAME = FIRST_NAME + ' ' +MIDDLE_NAME + LAST_NAME) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, source2 lookup(LANGUAGE == Reference_Code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(input(
		Provider_ID as integer,
		Client_Provider_ID as string,
		CMS_Provider_ID as string,
		UPIN as string,
		Full_Name as string,
		Name_Prefix as string,
		First_Name as string,
		Middle_Name as string,
		Last_Name as string,
		Professional_Suffix as string,
		PROVIDER_TITLE as string,
		Company_Name as string,
		Email_Address as string,
		Email_Usage_Type_Code as string,
		Address_Line_1 as string,
		Address_Line_2 as string,
		City as string,
		County as string,
		State_Code as string,
		Zip as string,
		Phone_Number_1 as string,
		Phone_Number_2 as string,
		Phone_Number_3 as string,
		Fax_Number_1 as string,
		Fax_Number_2 as string,
		Fax_Number_3 as string,
		Client_Location_ID as string,
		Location_Name as string,
		Location_Usage_Type_Code as string,
		Location_Contact_Full_Name as string,
		Location_Contact_First_Name as string,
		Location_Contact_Last_Name as string,
		Provider_Location_Effective_Date as date,
		Provider_Location_Termination_Date as date,
		Usage_Preference_Code as string,
		NPI as string,
		DEA_Number as string,
		TIN as string,
		TIMELY_FILING_LIMIT as string,
		SSN as string,
		Provider_Effective_Date as string,
		Provider_Termination_Date as string,
		Network_Ind as string,
		Facility_Code as string,
		Management_Group_Code as string,
		Primary_Language_Code as string,
		Location_Key as string,
		Exclude_From_MR_Chase as string,
		Exclude_From_PR_Relationship as string,
		Source_System_Of_Record as string,
		Medicare_Facility_Number as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Provider_ID = PROVIDER_ID,
		CMS_Provider_ID,
		UPIN,
		NPI,
		TIN,
		TIMELY_FILING_LIMIT,
		Full_Name = FULL_NAME,
		First_Name = FIRST_NAME,
		Middle_Name = MIDDLE_NAME,
		Last_Name = LAST_NAME,
		Name_Prefix = PROVIDER_NAME_PREFIX,
		Professional_Suffix = PROVIDER_NAME_SUFIX,
		PROVIDER_TITLE,
		Address_Line_1 = PHYSICAL_ADDRESS1,
		Address_Line_2 = PHYSICAL_ADDRESS2,
		City = PHYSICAL_CITY,
		State_Code = PHYSICAL_STATE,
		Zip = PHYSICAL_ZIP,
		Phone_Number_1 = PHONE,
		Fax_Number_1 = FAX,
		Exclude_From_MR_Chase = EXCLUDEFROMMRCHASE,
		Exclude_From_PR_Relationship = EXCLUDEFROMPRRELATIONSHIP,
		DEA_Number = DEA_NUMBER,
		Primary_Language_Code = LANGUAGE,
		Client_Provider_ID,
		Company_Name,
		Email_Address,
		Email_Usage_Type_Code,
		County,
		Phone_Number_2,
		Phone_Number_3,
		Fax_Number_2,
		Fax_Number_3,
		Client_Location_ID,
		Location_Name,
		Location_Usage_Type_Code,
		NPI = Location_Contact_Full_Name,
		Location_Contact_Full_Name = Location_Contact_First_Name,
		Location_Contact_First_Name = Location_Contact_Last_Name,
		SSN,
		Network_Ind,
		Facility_Code,
		Management_Group_Code,
		Network_Ind,
		Facility_Code,
		Management_Group_Code,
		Location_Key,
		Source_System_Of_Record,
		Medicare_Facility_Number,
		Exclude_From_PR_Relationship = Provider_Location_Effective_Date,
		Source_System_Of_Record = Provider_Location_Termination_Date,
		Usage_Preference_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		{ISO 639-2 Code} as string,
		{English name of Language} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		Language_Code as string,
		Language_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Language_Code = {ISO 639-2 Code},
		Language_Name = {English name of Language}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkLanguagecodes

source(output(
		{PRODUCT CODE} as string,
		DESCRIPTION as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		Product_Code as string,
		Product_Code_Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Product_Code = {PRODUCT CODE},
		Product_Code_Description = DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		PlanCode as string,
		PlanDescription as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		Plan_Code as string,
		Plan_Code_description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Plan_Code = PlanCode,
		Plan_Code_description = PlanDescription
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

		PROVIDER_ID as string,

		County as string,
		Phone_Number_2 as string,
		Phone_Number_3 as string,
		Fax_Number_2 as string,
		Fax_Number_3 as string,
		Client_Location_ID as string,
		Location_Name as string,
		Location_Usage_Type_Code as string,
		Location_Contact_Full_Name as string,
		Location_Contact_First_Name as string,
		Location_Contact_Last_Name as string,
		SSN as string,

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(PROVIDER_ALTERNATE_IDENTIFIER = PROVIDER_ID + TIN) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		PROVIDER_ID,
		PROVIDER_ALTERNATE_IDENTIFIER
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		Provider_Alternate_Identifier as string,
		Provider_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Provider_Alternate_Identifier = PROVIDER_ALTERNATE_IDENTIFIER,
		Provider_ID = PROVIDER_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		Code as string,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		Provider_Type_Code as string,
		Provider_Type_Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,

	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,

	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,

Select1 derive(Provider_Alternate_Identifier = PROVIDER_ID + TIN) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(

	allowSchemaDrift: true,

		Value as string,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,

source1 sink(input(
